game_description: There's an asteroid storm coming for the space station, you're going to have to protect the space station as best you can. Use your pistol to shoot the asteroids, to keep as much of the space station intact as you can. On the left side of your gun there's a reading of the percentage of the space station still left. If it hits 0% - it's game over.
review_1: Good take on a classic theme. Controls are well done and the upgrades work great!
